organizations: Coverage College Football Blog College Football Week
title: College Football Week 8 Betting Trends
text:
Outkick The Coverage College Football Blog College Football Week 8 Betting Trends Ohio State is on a 20-game straight-up win streak. By Lori Kelly Oct 21, 2015 at 1:07p ET 0Shares 
Special to Outkick The Coverage from OddsShark.com 
The Utah Utes are 8-1 against the spread in their last nine road games, and they'll be looking to win outright on the road this week against the USC Trojans. Utah is No. 3 in the latest AP Top 25 poll, but they're still listed as 3.5-point road underdogs against USC at sportsbooks monitored by OddsShark.com. The Trojans are 0-3 both SU and ATS in their last three October games, while totals bettors will note that the UNDER is 4-1 in Utah's last five games against USC. 
In other Pac-12 action this week, the California Golden Bears are 5-2 ATS in their last seven games against UCLA, and the Stanford Cardinal are 16-0 SU in their last 16 October home games ahead of a visit from the Washington Huskies on Saturday. 
Ohio State is on a 20-game SU win streak as they play at Rutgers on Saturday. Alabama is 14-5 ATS in its last 19 October games as they host Tennessee, and Michigan State is just 1-6 ATS in its last seven games and 1-5 ATS in its last six games against Indiana. 
Check out more trends and stats below courtesy of the OddsShark College Football Database . 

California is riding a run of 5-2 ATS in games against UCLA. 
UCLA is riding a run of 0-8 ATS in October games. 
The UNDER is 8-0 in UCLA's last eight home games. 

Texas A&M at Ole Miss 
Ole Miss is riding a run of 3-0 ATS in games against Texas A&M. 
The UNDER is 7-0 in Ole Miss's last seven October games. 
Texas A&M is riding a run of 14-4 SU in road games. 

Ohio State is riding a run of 20-0 SU overall. 
Ohio State is riding a run of 14-6 ATS in October road games. 
Rutgers is riding a run of 1-3 SU and ATS in October home games. 

Alabama is riding a run of 8-0 SU in games against Tennessee. 
Alabama is riding a run of 14-5 ATS in October games. 
The UNDER is 11-3 in Alabama's last 14 October home games. 

USC is riding a run of 0-3 SU and ATS in October games. 
Utah is riding a run of 8-1 ATS in road games. 
The UNDER is 4-1 in Utah's last five games against USC. 

The OVER is 5-0 in LSU's last five games overall. 
LSU is riding a run of 14-0 SU in October home games. 
Western Kentucky is riding a run of 9-2 ATS in October road games. 

Michigan State is riding a run of 1-6 ATS overall. 
Michigan State is riding a run of 1-5 ATS in games against Indiana. 
The OVER is 7-2 in Indiana's last nine October games. 

Stanford is riding a run of 16-0 SU in October home games. 
Stanford is riding a run of 5-0 SU and ATS overall. 
The UNDER is 8-3 in Washington's last 11 games against Stanford. 

Clemson is riding a run of 3-1 ATS in games against Miami. 
Miami is riding a run of 16-3 SU in home games. 
Clemson is riding a run of 1-5 ATS in October games. 

Florida State at Georgia Tech 
Florida State is riding a run of 17-1 SU in road games. 
Florida State is riding a run of 6-14 ATS overall. 
Georgia Tech is riding a run of 6-0 ATS in games against Florida State. 

Baylor is riding a run of 18-2 SU and 15-5 ATS in home games. 
Iowa State is riding a run of 2-9 ATS overall. 
The OVER is 8-1 in Baylor's last nine home games. 0
